name: integrated titlebar
description: replaces the native window titlebar with buttons inset into the app.

options.label: tiling window manager mode
options.tooltip: **completely remove the close/minimise/maximise buttons** (only for advanced use, not recommended)

options.label: dragarea height (px)
options.tooltip: **the height of the rectangle added to the top of the window, used to drag/move the window around** (dragging is not possible in a frameless window without this bar)

options.label: minimize window icon
options.tooltip: **may be an svg string or any unicode symbol e.g. an emoji** (the default icon will be used if this field is left empty)

options.label: maximize window icon
options.tooltip: **may be an svg string or any unicode symbol e.g. an emoji** (the default icon will be used if this field is left empty)

options.label: unmaximize window icon
options.tooltip: **may be an svg string or any unicode symbol e.g. an emoji** (the default icon will be used if this field is left empty)

options.label: close window icon
options.tooltip: **may be an svg string or any unicode symbol e.g. an emoji** (the default icon will be used if this field is left empty)
